title: Pontas
body:
The main points are: S. Lourenço in the municipality of Machico, which has several secondary points such as Furado, Abra, Dedais, Rosto, etc.; Queimada, in the same municipality; Santa Catarina, Guindaste, Atalaia, and Oliveira, in the municipality of Santa Cruz; Cruz, in the municipality of Funchal; Agua, in the municipality of Camara de Lôbos; Sol, in the municipality of Ponta do Sol; Galé and Pargo, in the municipality of Calheta; Tristão, in the municipality of Porto do Moniz; Delgada, in the municipality of S. Vicente; and S. Jorge, Santana, and Cortado, in the municipality of Santana (See these names).

The main points of the island of Porto Santo are: Incão, Frades, Branca, Cruz, Varadouros, Furado, and Calheta. (See Porto Santo).

In the Desertas, there are: the point of Agulha, in Bugio, and Boqueirão, Pedregal, Norte, and Rocha Negra, in Deserta Grande (See Desertas and Cabos).

Desertas: Point of Agulha in Bugio, and Boqueirão, Pedregal, Norte, and Rocha Negra in Deserta Grande
